meanings.sent1: The unfrozen lake sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The ice cream became unfrozen after being left out for a while.
meanings.sent3: The unfrozen popsicle started dripping all over my hand!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as unfrozen as the winter lake.
meanings.sent5: The unfrozen river flowed freely through the valley.

meanings.sent1: The unfrozen meat was ready to be cooked.
meanings.sent2: The unfrozen vegetables were perfect for stir-frying.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally left the unfrozen chicken out too long!
meanings.sent4: His unfrozen attitude towards life was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The unfrozen ground welcomed the first signs of spring.
